subject: Horse Racing
Kentucky Derby
Horses
lead_paragraph: The owner of the top two finishers in the U.A.E. Derby, none other than the ruler of Dubai, decided he would try again to capture America’s greatest horse race.
snippet: The owner of the top two finishers in the U.A.E. Derby, none other than the ruler of Dubai, decided he would try again to capture America’s greatest horse race.
